content.title: Start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology
content.author: Steve Jobs
content.quote_text: You've gotta start with the customer experience and work backwards to the technology.

generation.prompt: J.M.W. Turner style atmospheric luminism with golden light dissolving and emerging from forms, soft focus throughout composition, luminous passages where paint itself seems to glow, forms suggested rather than defined by light, atmospheric perspective creating infinite depth. Capturing the vibe of clarity, inspiration. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
